entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
